bookSourceComment:
var v = source.getVariable();
"" == v || null == v || undefined == v? 
((v = "源站：3"), source.setVariable(v)): ""

var flag = 1,
  host = "https://www.wshm.uk";
  发布页="https://ws8.in/"
host =
  -1 !== v.indexOf("1")
    ? "https://www.wshm22.com"
    : -1 !== v.indexOf("2")
    ? "https://www.wshm27.com"
    : -1 !== v.indexOf("3")
    ? "https://www.wshm.net"
    : "https://www.wshm.uk"
bookSourceUrl: 学编程救不了中国-----鲁迅
exploreUrl:

list=[

{"title":"2017","url":"/plus/list-13-26-{{page}}.html","style":{"layout_flexGrow":1}},

]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment)); var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result), $1 = function(a) { return String(J.select('[property="og:' + a + '"]').attr("content")) }, $2 = function(a) { return String(J.select(a).text()) }, $3 = function(a) { return String(J.select(a).attr("href")) }, $4 = function(a) { return String(J.select(a).attr("src")) }, url = baseUrl, s = $2(".dl_left:nth-child(3) dd").replace(/.*中.*/g, "连载").replace(/.*已.*/, "完结"), k = $2(".dl_left:nth-child(2) dd"), l = $2(".stab_list ul li:last-child a"), t = $2(".dl_left:last-child dd"), count = J.select(".stab_list ul li a").length; 1 == flag ? (book = { name: $2("span.name"), author: $2(".dl.clearfix dl:first-child dd").replace(/[,xX\s]|[图文][:：]/g, "/").replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/").replace(/^[\/]/g, ""), kind: s + "," + k + "," + t, latest: l + "·" + t + "·[" + count + "]", intro: "
" + $2(".des_xy").replace(/\\n/g, "
").replace(/\\/g, ""), cover: $4(".detail_img .dpic"), url: url }, book) : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
imgs=""
if (1 == flag){
	imgs=java.getString
	(".playerall@img[src*=img.pic-server]@html")
}
else java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
imgs
</js>

ruleExplore.author:
.actor@text
@js:result
  .replace(/[,，xX\s]|[图文][:：]/g,'/')
  .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g,'/')
  .replace(/^[\/]/g,'')
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
1 == flag ? (java.put("Enable", 1), java.getElements(".li_li.clearfix .li_all")) : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
ruleExplore.name: .name@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
list = java.getElements(".stab_list ul li a");
1 == flag ? java.toast("\n♥当前源变量♥\n"+host): java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
list;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
body = {
    method: "POST",
    body: "q = {{key}}"
};
1 == flag ?host+ "/plus/search.php," + JSON.stringify(body) : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
